clinical_study.brief_title: Association Between Fear of Falling and Spinal Stiffness.
clinical_study.official_title: L'Impact de la Raideur Articulaire Pelvienne Sur la Peur de Chuter du Sujet âgé hospitalisé ou en Institution.

brief_summary.textblock:
1. / evaluation of the fear of falling using an FES-I questionnaire, distribution of subjects according to the score into 3 groups (16-19: little concerned by the fear of falling, 20-27 moderately concerned, 28-64 very concerned by fear of falling)
2. / evaluation of lumbar articular mobility by the schober index, coxofemoral by hip goniometry in flexion and extension (no evaluation of other amplitudes because lack of abduction / abduction / external and internal rotation of the hip remain functional in walking and the balance)

detailed_description.textblock:
1. / evaluation of the fear of falling using an FES-I questionnaire, distribution of subjects according to the score into 3 groups (16-19: little concerned by the fear of falling, 20-27 moderately concerned, 28-64 very concerned by fear of falling)
2. / evaluation of lumbar articular mobility by the schober index, coxofemoral by hip goniometry in flexion and extension (no evaluation of other amplitudes because lack of abduction / abduction / external and internal rotation of the hip remain functional in walking and the balance)

primary_outcome.description: Highlight a significant positive association between hips' goniometry (angle degree) and FES-I score (continuous scale without unit)

primary_outcome.measure: Association FES-I (continuous scale without unit) and Schober index (centimeter)
primary_outcome.description: Highlight a significant positive association between Shober index and FES-I score

intervention.description: anthropomorphic measurements + FES questionnaire + demographic data and medications

study_pop.textblock: > 75 ans, in any geriatric department of the hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- over 75 years old,
- Ability to understand and answer a questionnaire in French
- Ability to stand up
- Patient from the Melun hospital (santé pole center + nursing home of the GHSIF)
- Affiliated with a social security scheme
Exclusion Criteria:
- mental disorders,
- lumbar surgery
